content: Add message limit information to user data in admin users endpoint
Add message limit column to users list in admin dashboard
Replace asterisk with Settings icon for custom message limits
Improve message limit display and add edit functionality
Add tooltip to Message Limit column header showing default limit
Add tooltip icon to header and make limit values bold instead of header
Add highlighted variant to Badge component for custom limits
Implement UX improvements for edit button placement and accessibility
Replace custom edit button with React Admin InPlaceEditor
Create custom InPlaceEditor component using shadcn/ui components
Rewrite InPlaceEditor to match original React Admin implementation
Implement subtle inline editing UI improvements
Redesign InlineInput with Linear-style clear visual feedback
Add proper edit mode indication with borders and backgrounds
Implement smooth Linear-style micro-animations
Add auto-focus functionality to input when entering edit mode
Simplify input structure by removing nested InlineInput component
Make edit mode borders more subtle and barely visible
Refactor auto-focus from useEffect to reducer pattern
Transform reading state to clear box appearance with visible borders
Redesign editing state with proper input field styling
Update action buttons with Check icon and loading spinner
Add consistent spacing and visual hierarchy
Reduce sizing to make the inline editor more subtle
